item.title: Linear algebra change of basis explained using Python
item.description: Motivation I'm always forgetting about the intuition behind the change of basis in linear algebra.

item.title: Lagrangian duality example using ob-python
item.description: Introduction This is an example extracted from "An Introduction to Structural Optimization", I also added a few extra images to clarify some points.

item.title: Lagrange multipliers example
item.description: Introduction This is an experiment with org-mode and ob-python that simulates a notebok environment which mix code, text and math (latex).
